titles.title: "Doushin ni Kaette Asobutte Ii yo Nee. Doushin ni Kaennakute mo Asobu kedo nee" by Kazumi
C`est bon de retomber en enfance et de jouer. Même si ce n`est pas nécessaire.
It`s Great to Go Back to Being a Kid Again and Having Fun. Although, I Can Have Fun Without Going Back to Being a Kid, Too.
「童心に返って遊ぶっていいよねー. 童心に返えんなくても遊ぶけどねー」by和美
